gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我買不起那麼昂貴的手機。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I can't afford such an expensive phone.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ mǎi bù qǐ nàme ángguì de shǒujī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個旅遊團很昂貴，但是包含很多特別的活動。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This tour group is expensive, but it includes many special activities.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège lǚyóu tuán hěn ángguì, dànshì bāohán hěn duō tèbié de huódòng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他喜歡買昂貴的車子來炫耀。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He likes to buy expensive cars to show off.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā xǐhuān mǎi ángguì de chēzi lái xuànyào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這間餐廳的價格比較昂貴，但是味道很好。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The prices at this restaurant are relatively expensive, but the taste is good.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè jiān cāntīng de jiàgé bǐjiào ángguì, dànshì wèidào hěn hǎo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個壁畫的表面很凹凸，可以感受到立體的效果。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The surface of this mural is very uneven, you can feel the three-dimensional effect.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège bìhuà de biǎomiàn hěn āotū, kěyǐ gǎnshòu dào lìtǐ de xiàoguǒ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這座山上有許多凹凸不平的地方，很難行走。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: There are many uneven places on this mountain, it's difficult to walk.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè zuò shān shàng yǒu xǔduō āotū bùpíng de dìfāng, hěn nán xíngzǒu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這種裝飾品的表面有著很明顯的凹凸紋理。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The surface of this decoration has very obvious textured patterns.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè zhǒng zhuāngshìpǐn de biǎomiàn yǒu zhe hěn míngxiǎn de āotū wénlǐ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這本書的封面很凹凸，看起來很有質感。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The cover of this book is very uneven, it looks very textured.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè běn shū de fēngmiàn hěn āotū, kàn qǐlái hěn yǒu zhìgǎn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這張沙發坐起來感覺有些凹凸不平，不是很舒服。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This sofa feels a bit uneven to sit on, it's not very comfortable.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè zhāng shāfā zuò qǐlái gǎnjué yǒuxiē āotū bùpíng, bùshì hěn shūfu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她徹夜熬夜準備考試。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She stayed up all night to prepare for the exam.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā chèyè áoyè zhǔnbèi kǎoshì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個醬料要熬一段時間才能變得更香。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This sauce needs to be simmered for a while to become more flavorful.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège jiàngliào yào áo yī duàn shíjiān cái néng biàn dé gèng xiāng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我每天需要熬粥給病人吃。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I need to cook porridge for the patients every day.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ měitiān xūyào áozhōu gěi bìngrén chī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他熬夜工作已經習以為常。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He is used to working overnight.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā áoyè gōngzuò yǐjīng xíyǐwéicháng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個工程需要熬過困難的時期才能成功。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This project needs to go through difficult times to succeed.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège gōngchéng xūyào áo guò kùnnan de shíqī cái néng chénggōng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這本小說的結局真是奧秘。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The ending of this novel is really mysterious.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè běn xiǎoshuō de jiéjú zhēnshì àomì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個謎語的答案仍然是奧秘。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The answer to this riddle is still a mystery.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège míyǔ de dá'àn réngrán shì àomì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這座古城有著無數的奧秘等待著被發現。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This ancient city holds countless mysteries waiting to be discovered.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè zuò gǔchéng yǒu zhe wúshù de àomì děngdài zhe bèi fāxiàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 犯罪的動機是一個奧秘，正在調查中。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The motive for the crime is a mystery and is currently under investigation.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Fànzuì de dòngjī shì yīgè àomì, zhèngzài diàochá zhōng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 科學家仍在試圖解開這個宇宙的奧秘。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Scientists are still trying to unlock the mysteries of the universe.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Kēxuéjiā réng zài shìtú jiě kāi zhè ge yǔzhòu de àomì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他在花園裡扒土。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He is digging the soil in the garden.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zài huāyuán lǐ bā tǔ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們要把這層地扒開。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need to peel off this layer of earth.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yào bǎ zhè céng dì bā kāi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他喜歡用手扒飯吃。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He likes to eat rice with his hands.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā xǐhuān yòng shǒu bā fàn chī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他扒拉了一下我的衣服。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He tugged at my clothes.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bālā le yīxià wǒ de yīfu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 外面的風把樹葉扒落下來。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The wind outside blew the leaves off the trees.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wàimiàn de fēng bǎ shùyè bā luò xiàlái.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 醫生給我做了手術，切除了疤。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The doctor performed surgery on me and removed the scar.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Yīshēng gěi wǒ zuòle shǒushù, qiēchúle bā.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她的臉上有個深深的疤。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She has a deep scar on her face.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de liǎn shàng yǒu gè shēnshēn de bā.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他的手上有許多疤痕，看起來很嚴重。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He has many scars on his hands, it looks serious.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de shǒu shàng yǒu xǔduō bāhén, kàn qǐlái hěn yánzhòng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這種傷疤會永遠留在他的心上。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This kind of scar will forever remain in his heart.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè zhǒng shāngbā huì yǒngyuǎn liú zài tā de xīn shàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我的手臂上有一道細小的疤痕。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: There is a small scar on my arm.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ de shǒubì shàng yǒu yī dào xìxiǎo de bāhén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他巴不得能早點下班。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He wishes he could get off work earlier.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bābùdé néng zǎodiǎn xiàbān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他巴不得能找到一份好工作。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He wishes he could find a good job.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bābùdé néng zhǎodào yī fèn hǎo gōngzuò.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我已經帶好雨傘了，巴不得下雨呢。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I've already brought an umbrella, wishing it would rain.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng dài hǎo yǔsǎn le, bābùdé xiàyǔ ne.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她巴不得能和男朋友一起去旅行。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She wishes she could travel with her boyfriend.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bābùdé néng hé nán péngyǒu yīqǐ qù lǚxíng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我巴不得能去看一場音樂會。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I wish I could go see a concert.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ bābùdé néng qù kàn yī chǎng yīnyuèhuì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他為了晉升巴結上司。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He tries to curry favor with his boss in order to get promoted.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā wèile jìnshēng bājiē shàngsī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她常常巴結有錢人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She often flatters wealthy people.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā chángcháng bājiē yǒu qián rén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個人很會巴結人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This person is very good at flattering others.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège rén hěn huì bājiē rén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他對長官巴結有加。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He goes all out to curry favor with his superior.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā duì zhǎngguān bājiē yǒu jiā.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這是一個巴結權貴的社會。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This is a society that flatters the powerful.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè shì yī ge bājiē quán guì de shè huì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 有時候過度稱讚孩子只會拔苗助長。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Sometimes excessive praise for children will only spoil them.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Yǒushíhòu guòdù chēngzàn háizi zhǐ huì bámíngzhùzhǎng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 成績單誇獎學生能夠拔苗助長。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Praising students on their report card can help them improve.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Chéngjì dān kuājiǎng xuéshēng nénggòu bámíngzhùzhǎng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 電視節目不應該拔苗助長暴力行為。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: TV programs should not encourage violent behavior.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Diànshì jiémù bù yīnggāi bámíngzhùzhǎng bàolì xíngwéi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 為了鼓勵員工，公司有時會拔苗助長。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: In order to encourage employees, companies sometimes spoil them.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wèile gǔlì yuángōng, gōngsī yǒushí huì bámíngzhùzhǎng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 好友應該幫助對方成長，而不是拔苗助長。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Good friends should help each other grow, not spoil each other.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Hǎoyǒu yīnggāi bāngzhù duìfāng chéngzhǎng, ér bùshì bámíngzhùzhǎng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這次考試很關鍵，你要好好把關。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This exam is crucial, you need to be careful.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè cì kǎoshì hěn guānjiàn, nǐ yào hǎohǎo bǎguān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 公司要找一個專業的人來把關業務。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The company wants to hire a professional to oversee the business.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Gōngsī yào zhǎo yīgè zhuānyè de rén lái bǎguān yèwù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 在這個項目中，我負責把關每一個細節。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: In this project, I am responsible for scrutinizing every detail.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zài zhège xiàngmù zhōng, wǒ fùzé bǎguān měi yīgè xìjié.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 經理應該把關員工的工作品質。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The manager should monitor the quality of the employees' work.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Jīnglǐ yīnggāi bǎguān yuángōng de gōngzuò pǐnzhí.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 爸爸常常把關我的學習進度。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Dad often checks on my learning progress.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bàba chángcháng bǎguān wǒ de xuéxí jìndù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他用力拉把手。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He pulled the handle with force.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā yòng lì lā bǎ shǒu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請勿隨意觸摸車內的把手。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please do not touch the handles inside the car at will.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng wù suíyì chùmō chē nèi de bǎ shǒu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他一把扳動把手，開始前進。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He pulled the handle and started moving forward.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā yī bǎ bāndòng bǎ shǒu, kāishǐ qiánjìn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請將把手拉向下方。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please pull the handle downwards.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng jiāng bǎ shǒu lā xiàng xiàfāng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請剎車時抓緊把手。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please hold onto the handle tightly when braking.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng shāchē shí zhuā jǐn bǎ shǒu.
